snippet: A House committee grills Obama administration officials when Uruguay loses track of a Syrian who had been resettled there after his release from prison at the U.S. naval base in Cuba....
abstract: Republican lawmakers accuse Obama administration officials Lee Wolosky and Paul Lewis of transferring former Guantanamo Bay prisoners to countries incapable of monitoring them; at issue is disappearance of former detainee Jihad Diyab from Uruguay.
lead_paragraph: A House committee grills Obama administration officials when Uruguay loses track of a Syrian who had been resettled there after his release from prison at the U.S. naval base in Cuba.

headline.main: Transfer Policy Questioned After Former Guantánamo Bay Detainee Goes Missing
headline.print_headline: House Panel Questions Policy on Guantánamo Bay Transfers
